title: YOW! 2018 Cloud Performance Root Cause Analysis at Netflix
description: For the YOW! Conference Australia 2018 tour I had the opportunity to deliver a keynote talk about performance analysis at Netflix. I summarized the Netflix stack and explained how we examine performance problems cloud-wide, and then how we can drill down to instances using flame graphs and other tools. In some ways it is like a 60 minute boot-camp for new hires (if you're about to start work at Netflix, or just did, you should find it valuable).
